content.query:
DROP VIEW [dbo].[vw_Compte]
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_Compte] AS
WITH T AS (
   SELECT
       c.[code_compte]
      ,c.[name_compte]
      ,c.[code_business_compte]
      ,c.[code_business_compte_parent]
      ,c.[source]
   FROM
      [dbo].[Compte] c
      inner join (select max([date_integration]) [date_integration] from [dbo].[Compte]) d
         on d.[date_integration] = c.[date_integration]
    GROUP BY
       c.[code_compte]
      ,c.[name_compte]
      ,c.[code_business_compte]
      ,c.[code_business_compte_parent]
      ,c.[source]
)
SELECT
       [code_compte]
      ,[name_compte]
      ,[code_business_compte]
      ,[code_business_compte_parent]
      ,[code_business_compte] + ' - ' + [name_compte] as [compte]
FROM
   T
WHERE
   [source] = 'D365'
/*
UNION
SELECT
       T.[code_compte]
      ,T.[name_compte]
      ,T.[code_business_compte]
      ,T.[code_business_compte_parent]
FROM
   T
   left outer join T T1
      on    T1.[source] = 'D365'
      and   T1.[code_compte] = T.[code_compte]
WHERE
   T.[source] = 'Unicom'
   and T1.[code_compte] is null
*/
